references.paper_title: A Fast Iterative Shrinkage-Thresholding Algorithm for Linear Inverse Problems
references.reason: This foundational paper introduced FISTA, a fast algorithm for solving linear inverse problems, which is highly relevant to the iterative hard thresholding methods discussed.
This paper details improvements to iterative hard thresholding algorithms, increasing their speed and efficiency.
